Class TestGenFromUnitTest

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.mtu.cs.jls.sim.Reacts

    public class TestGenFromUnitTest
extends edu.mtu.cs.jls.elem.TestGen
    *************************************************************** Configures a Simulator to set values on input pins according to data in a unit test. (In contrast to the parent TestGen, which uses a proprietary file format.) The SimEvents posted by this class are generated outside the class (by JLS, to be precise). This class only posts those events. In contrast, TestGen, parses the file itself and posts the corresponding events, ****************************************************************
